abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of this structural
            adjustment project is to help the Government achieve its
            medium term goal of economic growth of about 2.5 percent
            rate per annum. To achieve this objective the Government has
            developed and adopted the following: 1) a growth strategy
            based on fisheries and rural sectors; 2) a program to
            improve economic management; and, 3) a program to promote
            the private sector. In addition, detailed action programs
            have been developed for macroeconomic management, civil
            service, public administration, the banking sector, energy,
            agriculture, food policy, fisheries, and private sector
            promotion. These action programs would be implemented over
            the next twelve months.
